data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cloud_and_local_total_physical_usage IS NULL OR cloud_and_local_total_physical_usage < cloud_and_local_physical_capacity) AND (cloud_and_local_system_usage IS NULL OR cloud_and_local_system_usage < cloud_and_local_system_capacity)) AS 'Health Score' FROM cohesity_storage_view_box FACET cohesity_storage_view_box_name
SELECT uniqueCount(cohesity_storage_view_box_name) AS 'View Boxs' FROM cohesity_storage_view_box FACET cohesity_storage_partition_name

presentation.title: Partition Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Partition of this View Box

data.nrql: SELECT sum(cloud_and_local_system_usage) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local System Usage (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The usage, as computed by the Linux ?statfs? command, after the size of the data is reduced by change-block tracking, compression and deduplication.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(cloud_and_local_total_physical_usage) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local Total Physical Usage (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The total capacity, as computed by the Cohesity Cluster, after the size of the data has been reduced by change-block tracking, compression and deduplication.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cloud_and_local_data_read) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local Data Read (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Provides the total amount of data read.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cloud_and_local_data_written) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local Data Written (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Provides the total amount of data written.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cloud_and_local_read_latency) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local Read Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The Read latency for Read IOS.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cloud_and_local_write_latency) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local Write Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The Write latency for Read IOS.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cloud_and_local_reads) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local Reads (Operations)
presentation.notes: Provides the Read latency for Read IOs.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cloud_and_local_writes) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cloud and Local Writes (Operations)
presentation.notes: Provides the Write latency for Write IOs.

data.nrql: SELECT average(data_reduction_ratio) FROM cohesity_storage_view_box COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Data Reduction Ratio
presentation.notes: The ratio of logical bytes (not reduced by change-block tracking, compression and deduplication) to physical bytes (reduced by change-block tracking, compression and deduplication).
